      • replaceMatchInCell

        private java.lang.Boolean replaceMatchInCell(java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> tableData,
                                   int row,
                                   int column,
                                   java.lang.Boolean isContinue,
                                   boolean isMultiple)
        Replace all text in the specified table cell matching the search criteria with the replacement text
        Parameters:
        tableData - list containing the table data row arrays
        row - table model row index
        column - table model column index
        isContinue - true to display the invalid input dialog, if applicable
        isMultiple - true if this is one of multiple cells to be entered and checked; false if only a single input is being entered
        Returns:
        true to indicate that subsequent errors should be displayed; false if subsequent errors should not be displayed; null if the replace operation should be canceled

      • selectNextMatchingCell

        private void selectNextMatchingCell(int direction)
        Select the next or previous cell matching the search text beginning at the currently selected cell
        Parameters:
        direction - +1 to search forwards, -1 to search backwards from the currently selected cell

      • updateTableData

        private void updateTableData(java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> tableData)
        Update the table data if a replacement occurred
        Parameters:
        tableData - list containing the table data row arrays

      • updateMatchCount

        private int updateMatchCount()
        Update the match counter text in the search dialog
        Returns:
        Number of matches
